verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <WH5058> on Neginoth מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <WH238> Give ear אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> to my prayer וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֝תְעַלַּ֗ם <WH5956> and hide מִתְּחִנָּתִֽי׃ <WH8467> not thyself from my supplication
הַקְשִׁ֣יבָה <WH7181> Attend לִּ֣י וַעֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> unto me and hear אָרִ֖יד <WH7300> me I mourn בְּשִׂיחִ֣י <WH7879> in my complaint וְאָהִֽימָה׃ <WH1949> and make a noise

מִקּ֤וֹל <WH6963> Because of the voice אוֹיֵ֗ב <WH341> of the enemy מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> because עָקַ֣ת <WH6125> of the oppression רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> of the wicked כִּי־ <WH3588> for יָמִ֥יטוּ <WH4131> for they cast עָלַ֥י <WH5921> and אָ֝֗וֶן <WH205> iniquity וּבְאַ֥ף <WH639> upon me and in wrath יִשְׂטְמֽוּנִי׃ <WH7852> they hate

לִ֭בִּי <WH3820> My heart יָחִ֣יל <WH2342> is sore pained בְּקִרְבִּ֑י <WH7130> within וְאֵימ֥וֹת <WH367> me and the terrors מָ֝֗וֶת <WH4194> of death נָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> are fallen עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and
יִרְאָ֣ה <WH3374> Fearfulness וָ֭רַעַד <WH7461> and trembling יָ֣בֹא <WH935> are come בִ֑י וַ֝תְּכַסֵּ֗נִי <WH3680> hath overwhelmed פַּלָּצֽוּת׃ <WH6427> upon me and horror

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> And I said מִֽי־ <WH4310> I יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> Oh that לִּ֣י אֵ֭בֶר <WH83> I had wings כַּיּוֹנָ֗ה <WH3123> like a dove אָע֥וּפָה <WH5774> [for then] would I fly away וְאֶשְׁכֹּֽנָה׃ <WH7931> and be at rest
הִ֭נֵּה <WH2009> Behold אַרְחִ֣יק <WH7368> far off נְדֹ֑ד <WH5074> Lo [then] would I wander אָלִ֖ין <WH3885> [and] remain בַּמִּדְבָּ֣ר <WH4057> in the wilderness סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
אָחִ֣ישָׁה <WH2363> I would hasten מִפְלָ֣ט <WH4655> my escape לִ֑י מֵר֖וּחַ <WH7307> from the windy סֹעָ֣ה <WH5584> storm מִסָּֽעַר׃ <WH5591> [and] tempest

בַּלַּ֣ע <WH1104> Destroy אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> O Lord פַּלַּ֣ג <WH6385> [and] divide לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <WH3956> their tongues כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רָאִ֨יתִי <WH7200> for I have seen חָמָ֖ס <WH2555> violence וְרִ֣יב <WH7379> and strife בָּעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> in the city

יוֹמָ֤ם <WH3119> Day וָלַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> and night יְסוֹבְבֻ֥הָ <WH5437> they go about עַל־ <WH5921> her upon חוֹמֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH2346> it upon the walls וְאָ֖וֶן <WH205> thereof mischief וְעָמָ֣ל <WH5999> also and sorrow בְּקִרְבָּֽהּ׃ <WH7130> [are] in the midst

הַוּ֥וֹת <WH1942> Wickedness בְּקִרְבָּ֑הּ <WH7130> [is] in the midst וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> not יָמִ֥ישׁ <WH4185> depart מֵ֝רְחֹבָ֗הּ <WH7339> not from her streets תֹּ֣ךְ <WH8496> thereof deceit וּמִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> and guile

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor אוֹיֵ֥ב <WH341> For [it was] not an enemy יְחָֽרְפֵ֗נִי <WH2778> [that] reproached וְאֶ֫שָּׂ֥א <WH5375> me then I could have borne לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor מְ֭שַׂנְאִי <WH8130> [it] neither [was it] he that hated עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against הִגְדִּ֑יל <WH1431> me [that] did magnify וְאֶסָּתֵ֥ר <WH5641> [himself] against me then I would have hid מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at
וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> But [it was] thou a man כְּעֶרְכִּ֑י <WH6187> mine equal אַ֝לּוּפִ֗י <WH441> my guide וּמְיֻדָּֽעִי׃ <WH3045> and mine acquaintance

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יַ֭חְדָּו <WH3162> together נַמְתִּ֣יק <WH4985> We took sweet ס֑וֹד <WH5475> counsel בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> unto the house אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God נְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> [and] walked בְּרָֽגֶשׁ׃ <WH7285> in company

[יַשִּׁימָוֶת כ] (יַשִּׁ֤י ק) (מָ֨וֶת <WH3451> let death seize ק) עָלֵ֗ימוֹ <WH5921> upon יֵרְד֣וּ <WH3381> upon them [and] let them go down שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> into hell חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> quick כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For רָע֖וֹת <WH7451> for wickedness בִּמְגוּרָ֣ם <WH4033> [is] in their dwellings בְּקִרְבָּֽם׃ <WH7130> [and] among
אֲ֭נִי <WH589> I אֶל־ <WH413> upon אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> upon God אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> As for me I will call וַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> and the LORD יוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3467> shall save

עֶ֤רֶב <WH6153> Evening וָבֹ֣קֶר <WH1242> and morning וְ֭צָהֳרַיִם <WH6672> and at noon אָשִׂ֣יחָה <WH7878> will I pray וְאֶהֱמֶ֑ה <WH1993> and cry aloud וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> and he shall hear קוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> my voice

פָּ֘דָ֤ה <WH6299> He hath delivered בְשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> in peace נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> my soul מִקֲּרָב־ <WH7128> from the battle לִ֑י כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בְ֝רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> [that was] against me for there were many הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> against

יִשְׁמַ֤ע ׀ <WH8085> shall hear אֵ֨ל ׀ <WH410> God וְֽיַעֲנֵם֮ <WH6031> defile וְיֹ֤שֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> them even he that abideth קֶ֗דֶם <WH6924> of old סֶ֥לָה <WH5542> Selah אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom אֵ֣ין <WH369> there חֲלִיפ֣וֹת <WH2487> Because they have no changes לָ֑מוֹ וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> not יָרְא֣וּ <WH3372> therefore they fear אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> not God
שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> He hath put forth יָ֭דָיו <WH3027> his hands בִּשְׁלֹמָ֗יו <WH7965> against such as be at peace חִלֵּ֥ל <WH2490> with him he hath broken בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1285> his covenant

חָלְק֤וּ ׀ <WH2505> were smoother מַחְמָאֹ֣ת <WH4260> than butter פִּיו֮ <WH6310> [The words] of his mouth וּֽקֲרָב־ <WH7128> but war לִ֫בּ֥וֹ <WH3820> [was] in his heart רַכּ֖וּ <WH7401> were softer דְבָרָ֥יו <WH1697> his words מִשֶּׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> than oil וְהֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> they פְתִחֽוֹת׃ <WH6609> yet [were] they drawn swords

הַשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <WH7993> Cast עַל־ <WH5921> upon יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> upon the LORD יְהָבְךָ֮ <WH3053> thy burden וְה֪וּא <WH1931> and He יְכַ֫לְכְּלֶ֥ךָ <WH3557> and he shall sustain לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> suffer לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> thee he shall never מ֗וֹט <WH4131> to be moved לַצַּדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> the righteous

וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> O אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <WH430> But thou O God תּוֹרִדֵ֬ם ׀ <WH3381> shalt bring them down לִבְאֵ֬ר <WH875> into the pit שַׁ֗חַת <WH7845> of destruction אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> men דָמִ֣ים <WH1818> bloody וּ֭מִרְמָה <WH4820> and deceitful לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יֶחֱצ֣וּ <WH2673> shall not live out half יְמֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3117> their days וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I אֶבְטַח־ <WH982> but I will trust בָּֽךְ׃
